sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均有"建设，建立，建造"之意。
sameAnalysis.word_list: build, construct, found, erect, establish, set up
means: build ： 普通用词，含义广泛，可指一切具体或抽象的建造或建立。
construct ： 较正式用词，强调根据一定计划进行的规模较大，结构较复杂，要求较高技术的建造。
found ： 侧重打下基础或创办，具体或抽象事物均可用。
erect ： 侧重指对高而垂直物的建造。使用不如build广泛。
establish ： 着重稳固地建成，可具体指国家、政府、学校或商店等的建立，也可指信仰、信用、名誉、法律、制度、规则等的建立。
set up ： 作"建立"用时，侧重于"开始"。可指具体或抽象的建立。

sentence.Network_en: Any attempt to construct an ideal society is foredoomed to failure.
sentence.Network_cn: 任何构建理想社会的努力都注定要失败。

sentence.Network_en: It is proverbially easier to destroy than to construct.
sentence.Network_cn: 谁都知道破坏容易建设难.

sentence.Network_en: How many man - days will be needed to construct this irrigation canal?
sentence.Network_cn: 修这条渠道要多少人工?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 新东方GRE词汇 - 豆丁网 ... constringe ? vt. 压缩 construct ? v. 建造 consummate ? adj. 完美的.
网球拍_百度百科 ... F——form（ 形状） C——construct（ 构造） L——linear（ 线的选择）.
人教版高中英语词汇表 - 豆丁网 ... constant a. 经常的，不断的 construct v. 构筑；建造，建设 construction n. 建造，建设；建筑物.
托福高频词汇--托福词汇-托福-英语-育龙网 ... resemble vt. 像，相似 construct vt. 建造；创立 psychology n. 心理学.

list.abs: 形容人性格的词汇 ... competent 能胜任的； constructive 建设性的 cooperative 有合作精神的；.
园林景观专业英语词汇 ... constructed wetlands 人工湿地 construction 施工 construction document 施工文件.
高二英语必修五单词列表_百度文库 ... construct v. 建设 construction n. 建设 contribute v. 捐献.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Latin construct- 'heaped together, built', from the verb construere, from con- 'together' + struere 'pile, build'

entry.def: If you construct something such as a building, road, or machine, you build it or make it.

example.ex: The French constructed a series of fortresses from Dunkirk on the Channel coast to Douai...
example.tran: 法国人在从敦克尔刻到杜埃的英吉利海峡沿岸修筑了一系列要塞。

example.ex: The boxes should be constructed from rough-sawn timber...
example.tran: 这些箱子应该用粗锯木料来做。

entry.tran: 构想，构筑，构思(思想、作品、体系等)
entry.def: If you construct something such as an idea, a piece of writing, or a system, you create it by putting different parts together.

example.ex: You will find it difficult to construct a spending plan without first recording your spending...
example.tran: 你会发现不先把自己的开销记录下来就很难制订支出计划。

example.ex: He eventually constructed a business empire which ran to Thailand and Singapore...
example.tran: 他最终构筑起了一个延伸至泰国和新加坡的商业帝国。

entry.tran: 复杂的构想(或思想);观念
entry.def: A construct is a complex idea.

example.ex: ...the underlying constructs (beliefs, philosophy, etc.) which influence action and behaviour...
example.tran: 影响行动和行为的根本思想(信仰、处世哲学等)

example.ex: It was a re-enactment of the same mental construct under which slavery was justified.
example.tran: 这是为奴隶制辩护的同一思想观念的再现。

entry.def: A construct is something that is built, made, or created.

example.ex: As the flimsy constructs soared, the men paid out twine until the kites reached three or four thousand feet...
example.tran: 随着这轻薄的东西向上飞升，这些人慢慢放出细绳，直到风筝飞到三四千英尺高。

example.ex: The country was an artificial construct held together by force and intimidation for more than 70 years.
example.tran: 这个国家是靠武力和恐吓维系达七十余年的人治政权。

means.word_mean: 1. an abstract or general idea inferred or derived from specific instances
1. make by combining materials and parts;

sentences.sentence: "this little pig made his house out of straw"
"Some eccentric constructed an electric brassiere warmer"

means.word_mean: 2. put together out of components or parts;
3. draw with suitable instruments and under specified conditions;
5. create by organizing and linking ideas, arguments, or concepts;

auth_sentence.content: Because we each construct our own sense of meaning.
auth_sentence.res_content: Because we each construct our own sense of meaning.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Because we each construct our own sense of meaning.

auth_sentence.content: I construct a collection and it takes concrete form.
auth_sentence.res_content: I construct a collection and it takes concrete form.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I construct a collection and it takes concrete form.

auth_sentence.content: How did you construct the scheme of the storytelling?
auth_sentence.res_content: How did you construct the scheme of the storytelling?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: How did you construct the scheme of the storytelling?

stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 可破坏的, 易毁坏的
stems_affixes.word_buile: destruct破坏+ible能……的→adj.可破坏的, 易毁坏的
destruct破坏+ive……的→adj.破坏性
industry工业, 产业+ial……的→industrial
industry勤奋+ious..的→industrious
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ive表形容词→adj.有益的, 教育性的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
stems_affixes.word_buile: instrument[n.工具,仪器,器械;乐器]+al……的→adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的
obstruct[v.阻隔,阻塞[道路,通道等]n.阻碍物,障碍物]+ion表名词→n.妨碍,障碍物

stems_affixes.value_cn: 建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
stems_affixes.word_buile: construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]+ion表名词→n.建造,构造;建筑物,结构;释义,解释
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
destruct破坏+ion表名词→弄坏结构→破坏

stems_affixes.value_cn: 工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
stems_affixes.word_buile: indu=in+str=struct建立,结构+y→n.工业, 产业, 行业, 勤奋
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+ion表名词→n.教授;指导;[n.]用法说明[书],操作指南
instruct[v.教,教授;命令,指示]+or人→n.指导者,教员
in内+stru=struct建立,结构+ment物→内部构造→仪器,工具
instrumental[adj.仪器的;器械的;乐器的;起作用的;有帮助的]+ity性质→n.手段
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

stems_affixes.value_cn: 基础,下部结构,地下建筑
stems_affixes.word_buile: sub下面+struct建立,结构+ion表名词→建造在下面
super上面+structure结构→上面的结构→上层建筑
con共同+struct建立,结构→共同建立→建设,建造
de坏+stroy=struct建立,结构→v.破坏,摧毁,消灭
de去掉,变坏+struct建立,结构→adj.破坏的 n.故意或有计划的破坏 v.破坏
in进+struct建立,结构→把知识建立进去→指导,指示
ob反+struct建立,结构→反建设→阻塞,阻碍
re再+construct[v.建设,建造,构造;创立]→v.重建,再建;重现,再现
struct建立,结构+ure表名词→n.结构,构造;建筑物 v.构造,建造

Sentence.sentence: Esperanto also has a highly productive system of constructing new words from old ones.

means.word_mean: 修建, 建立，建筑，建造

sentences.en: They constructed the bridge in a year.
sentences.cn: 他们花一年时间建起了那座桥。

sentences.en: He has constructed a new theory.

sentences.cn: 这篇文章的构思很不错。

jushi.english: Construct a sentence with the verb “be”.
Let's construct a square on this line.
jushi.chinese: 让我们以这条线做一个正方形。
他们修建了15公里长的堤坝。
